mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_user ( user_name, password, name, age, sex, birthday, created, updated ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{name}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, NOW(), NOW() );
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_user SET user_name = #{userName}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, age = #{age}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, updated = NOW() WHERE (id = #{id});
mapper.delete: delete from tb_user where id in #{id}
